title: Week 1 NFL Recap, Analysis (Football 9/9)
description:
Will Brinson is joined by Ryan Wilson, John Breech and Sean Wagner-McGough to recap all the Week 1 Sunday action from around the NFL. The guys discuss how impressive the Patriots were against the Steelers (2:00), the Browns failing to live up to the hype (17:00), and injuries to Tyreek Hill and Nick Foles in Chiefs-Jags (27:00). They continue the conversation analyzing Kyler Murray's debut which ended in a tie (40:00), the Ravens thrashing the Dolphins (46:00) and Will's Super Bowl pick, the Vikings, looking good in their opener (51:00). More recaps follow, including: Panthers-Rams (58:00), Eagles-Redskins (1:05:00), Cowboys-Giants (1:10:00), Chargers-Colts (1:19:00), 49ers-Bucs (1:24:00), Bills-Jets (1:30:00) and lastly Bengals-Seahawks (1:35:00).
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
  
 Learn more about your ad choices. Visit https://podcastchoices.com/adchoices
